author: beringela1311
content: For the `/transactions` endpoint (and some others that return "all" of something), what are the `p` and `ps` parameters? I guess it is something to do with paging, maybe `p` is page number and `ps` is page size?

author: kanagwa
content: You're correct; `p` represents the page number and `ps` represents the page size. We will add more details to the Swagger UI to provide additional context, as this is the second time we have received this question.
